channel.title: Monerica - Newest and Sponsored Listings
channel.description: The latest additions and sponsors in our directory.

item.title: Cwtch
item.description: Non-Profits > Technologies : a decentralized, privacy-preserving, multi-party messaging protocol that can be used to build metadata resistant applications.

item.title: Memorial Center
item.description: Non-Profits > Activism : Institute helping political prisoners.

item.title: Solidarityzone
item.description: Non-Profits > Activism : Solidarity zone is a horizontal initiative, which exposes the persecution of, and provides practical support to, those arrested for anti-war actions in Russia.

item.title: DroidFS
item.description: Non-Profits > Technologies : Android Encrypted folder - Note: donations

item.title: OpenAlias
item.description: Non-Profits > Technologies : Seeks to provide a way to simplify aliasing amidst a rapidly shifting technology climate. Users are trying to cross the bridge to private and cryptographically secure infrastructure and systems, but many of them have just barely started remembering the email addresses of their friends and family.

item.title: V2ray
item.description: Non-Profits > Technologies : A set of tools to help you build your own privacy network over internet. The core of Project V, named V2Ray, is responsible for network protocols and communications. It can work alone, as well as combine with other tools.

item.title: RabbitDNS
item.description: Non-Profits > Technologies : A privacy-focused DNS service that doesn't collect any user data. We believe that your online activity should be private, so we don't log or track any of your DNS queries.

item.title: Kicksecure
item.description: Non-Profits > Technologies : A secure by default OS always based on the latest security research.

item.title: Quetzalcoatl
item.description: Non-Profits > Security : Funder and maintainer of Tor Exit relays.

item.title: ✅ XGRAM (sponsored)
item.description: Exchanges > Non-KYC Exchanges : Multi-chain exchange - Note: Over 590 exchange pairs with super low fees around 0.1% and an average swap time of just 12 minutes. - Location: Cyprus

item.title: Belibitcoin
item.description: Exchanges > Non-KYC Exchanges : OTC crypto trading in Indonesia. - Location: Indonesia

item.title: Coinswap
item.description: Exchanges > Non-KYC Exchanges : Swaps coins.

item.title: Unshackled
item.description: Non-Profits > Security : 501(c)(3) Non-Profit dedicated to defending digital freedom through secure technologies, education, and advocacy.

item.title: Privacy layer
item.description: Non-Profits > Technologies : A Tor Node Operator.

item.title: anonbnb
item.description:
Businesses > Real Estate Services : Anonymous alternative to airbnb, aligns with common values, from open source all the way to democracy.
We do not want to post about daily politics. Our principles are clear and we are working for a future full of live, diversity and protection. We will always work towards that goal no matter the political situation. - Note: This project is early stage, but we already have one host on anonbnb.
1. See nice bnb 2. Send us a message 3. Connected to host 4. Enjoying the anonbnb

item.title: ✅ Silent Exchange (sponsored)
item.description: Exchanges > Non-KYC Exchanges : Fast & Anonymous Crypto to Crypto Swaps. No email. No KYC.Trade-in Minutes. 1500+ Crypto Pairs 24/7/365 Service Fee starting from 1%. - Note: Trade using Telegram Bot - @silentexchangerobot , Support - @silentexchangeadmin - Contact: @silentexchange

item.description: Other Directories > Business Directories : French buisness directory that takes Monero.

item.title: ✅ AriaVPN (sponsored)
item.description: Businesses > VPN Companies : Protect your online privacy with a VPN service that is OpenVPN-based and run by sovereign privacy advocates. There's no need for sign-up, and no personal data are collected, nor any logs of any kind. All our VPN servers are equipped with in-house DNS servers in anonymous mode. - Contact: https://twitter.com/ariavpn_net

item.title: America First Jewelry
item.description: Businesses > Luxury Goods : America First Jewelry proudly crafts high-quality, patriotic jewelry right here in the USA. Every piece celebrates American pride, featuring designs inspired by the stars and stripes, eagles, and other iconic symbols of freedom. From necklaces to rings, our handcrafted collections honor the red, white, and blue with unwavering commitment to domestic craftsmanship. Wear your love for the nation close to your heart with America First Jewelry. - Note: Use "Pay with Crypto" option at checkout. - Location: Los Angeles, CA

We can also ship products. - Note: At Ward’s ACE & Country Store, we proudly accept XMR—because we believe in sound money, hard work, and community. We have served Malad City, Idaho and surrounding communities since 2007. - Location: Malad City, Idaho, United States - Contact: @wardsace

Restructured as a cross chain exchange. - Contact: support@coreswap.io
